channel.title: Big Data in Biomedicine
channel.description: Recent content on Big Data in Biomedicine

item.description: I am a Bioinformatics bachelor student at the LMU and TUM since 2017 and I’ve come to the ListLab to write my bachelor thesis on the prediction of chromatin structure from ChIP-seq data. Since my personal focus has always gone towards machine learning technology, this thesis topic seemed like a perfect fit for me and I’m glad I was accepted for it.
